nfo.data

Class Log

  • java.lang.Object
    • nfo.data.Log

  • public class Log
extends java.lang.Object
    Reports the program activity to the log files.
    Version:
    s1.1
    Author:
    IUT of Vannes - Student project, Alexandre Rio, Sebastien Le Corre, Julien Cadic

    • Method Detail

      • report

        public static void report(java.lang.String level,
          java.lang.String message)

        Reports a log

        Log syntax: DATE [LEVEL] (TRACE) MESSAGE

        Usage:

         Log.report(Log.SEVERE, "Fatal error");
        Output example:
        25/05/2012-8: 09:21 [SEVERE] (juanJoal.ihm.juanJoal :: hand: 10) Fatal error

        Parameters:
        level - Severity of the report (look at the attributes)
        message - The message to display.

      • authorized

        public static boolean authorized(java.lang.String level)
        Check if debug level is sufficient to see the message. Debug level is defined in the Global interface.
        Parameters:
        level - The level to check
        Returns:
        if it is allowed

      • access

        public static void access(java.lang.String user,
          java.lang.String action,
          java.lang.String subject)
        Report accesses
        Parameters:
        user - the nick of the current user
        action - the action the user performs
        subject - the subject the user is acting on

      • writeTextLog

        private static void writeTextLog(java.lang.String level,
                java.lang.String log,
                java.lang.String path)
        Write the log to the file
        Parameters:
        log - full log without date
        path - the output file path
        Since:
        1.2
